It has been decided that henceforth all matters related to scrutiny rectification and finalization of draft loan documents or any other documents submitted by BOT concessionaires with regard to loan arrangements entered into by them shall be directly handled by Finance. 2. Hence, all such documents either in the draft form submitted for approval of NHAI Or executed documents   (accompanied by the  required   Affidavit) should be forwarded to Finance. 3_ If any documents are currently pending with Technical Divisions, the same may be immediately forwarded to Finance. AllI issues related to Financial   Close date declaration, if currently pending, be segregated and these documents are also to be forwarded to Finance: 4 It  should be noted that in accordance with the provisions of the Concession Agreement all comments on Draft Documents submitted to NHAI for approval is to be provided to the Concessionaire within 15 days thereof. Since it is mandatory to conform to this timeline, divisions may forward all Loan Draft Documents received by them and currently pending if any, at the earliest: 5_ This issues with the approval of Chairman (Orders dated 04.05.2010). gkit (S.K.
